info.name: AKHMADS.NET API
info.description:
AKHMADS.NET - Telegram Ad Distribution Platform
Version: 2.0 (BEP-20 withdraw fixed)

O'zgarishlar:
- Withdraw: faqat BEP-20 USDT
- Fee: $3 FIXED
- Yangi: GET /payments/withdraw/info
- Yangi: GET /admin/withdrawals/all
- Webhook: Click, Payme, NOWPayments to'liq

request.description: Telegram login boshlash. loginToken va deepLink qaytaradi.
